阾字的基本解释

阾
lín
古同“邻”。

阾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lǐng］
［《廣韻》良郢切，上静，來。］
同“嶺1”。
[②]［líng］
［《集韻》郎丁切，平青，來。］
(1)见“顛阾”。
(2)用同“鄰”。邻居。

阾字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　阾； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1348第04
【玉篇】力井切【集韻】里郢切，?音領。【玉篇】阪也。【廣韻】古文嶺字。註詳山部十四畫。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?郞丁切，音靈。【廣韻】阪名。【集韻】巓阾，阪名。通作軨。

阾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
阾字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Lu
lín
Gu Tong is "neighbor".

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lǐng］
["Guangyun" Liangying cut, Shangjing, come. ]
Same as "Ling 1".
[②]［líng］
["Jiyun" Lang Dingqie, Pingqing, come. ]
(1) See "Dianlu".
(2) Use the same as "neighbor". neighbor.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Fu Character Department】　阾; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1348 04
[Jade articles] Lijing cut [Jiyun] Ying cut in the center, with a sound collar. [Jade articles] Sakaya. 【Guangyun】Ancient Ling characters. Note the fourteen paintings of the mountain.　[Guangyun] [Jiyun]? Yin Dingqie, the sound is great. [Guang Yun] Han name. [Jiyun] 巓阾, the name of the band. Pass as 軨.
